name: Way of the Samurai (PS2) scene study
name_original: Way of the Samurai (PS2) scene study
description:
Controls

Movement - WASD
Camera - Arrow keys
Draw sword (toggle run) - Left Shift
Attack (while sword is drawn) - F

Description

This is a small scene study of the bridge area from Way of the Samurai (PS2). I wanted to see if I could capture the feel of it with my own aesthetic spin and using assets I already had access to.

If you're interested in seeing my process for this project, head here: https://imgur.com/a/yujTOt8.

Assets used

  • Unity's Terrain Tools
  • Unity's Post Processing Stack v2
  • Synty's Polygon SciFi Space (for the character + sword)
  • Synty's Polygon Nature (for the trees, bushes, etc)
  • Dustyroom's FlatKit (for the cel shading, fog effect, and grass)
